subject: Re: [junit] Testing classes that generate graphics.
msgSnippet: ... How about visually verifying the behavior on sample request with sample background. Save the sample background and result. Repeat the request in a test and
messageBody:
--- tchaffee@... wrote:
> I have an class that will draw vertically centered, line-wrapped text
> onto a background image[....]

How about visually verifying the behavior on sample request with sample
background. Save the sample background and result. Repeat the request
in a test and verify the request still builds the sample. Classic
regression testing. Anytime you break the test, by changing how the
graphics are created, you are forced to reverify.

Regards,

Rob
